td.content: s:patient presents with progressive Mental Health for past 4 days. patient is a 75 year old m retired. o:Height 67 in, Weight 231 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

s:pt says he is having symptoms of Mental Health 10 x week, mostly during the day. patient is a 75 yr old M retired. o:Height 66 in, Weight 226 lbs, Temperature 97.7 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed haloperidol - 1 mg 2 x day.
